songs.title: Only You/Black Magic/Black Magic (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Only You: Perrie Edwards]
Dancing with your silhouette in the places that we met
Ooh, tryna find you in the moon
Paris never feels the same, when the streets all call your name
Ooh, so I hide in crowded rooms

[Only You: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
And I'll follow right down the river
Where the ocean meets the sky
To you, to you

[Only You: All & Jade Thirlwall]
Once upon a time we had it all (Hmm-hmm-hmm)
Somewhere down the line we went and lost it
One brick at a time we watched it fall (Fa-a-a-ll)
I’m broken here tonight and darling, no one else can fix me
Only you, only you (Yeah)
And no one else can fix me, only you (No one like you, yeah)
Only you, only you
And no one else can fix me, only you

All the girls on the block knocking at my door
Wanna know what it is, make the boys want more

[Black Magic: Perrie Edwards]
Is your lover playing on your side?
Said he loves ya, but he ain't got time
Here's the answer, come and get it
At a knocked down price
All the girls on the block knocking at my door

[Black Magic: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Get your boy on his knees
And repeat after me, say

[Black Magic: All]
Take a sip of my secret potion
I'll make you fall in love
For a spell that can't be broken
One drop should be enough
Boy, you belong to me
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic, yeah

[Jesy Nelson starts hyping up the crowd before the beat drop.]

[Beat Switch]

[Black Magic (Remix): All & Jade Thirlwall]
Take a sip of my secret potion
I'll make you fall in love
For a spell that can't be broken
One drop should be enough
Boy, you belong to me
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic, yeah
Take a sip of my secret potion
One taste and you'll be mine
It's a spell that can't be broken
It'll keep you up all night (Ohh-oh-oh)
Boy, you belong to me
(Belong to, eh-eh-eh-eh)
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic

[Black Magic (Remix): Perrie Edwards, All & Jade Thirlwall]
(Woah, yeah, yeah) Falling in love, falling in love
(Yeah, yeah, yeah) Falling in love, falling in love
Falling in love, falling in love
Falling in love, falling in love
Magi-ic
